body:
### Contact Details (e.g. Tox ID or email)

_No response_

### qTox Version

1.18.0.rc2 and newest.

### Commit Hash

_No response_

### Toxcore Version

0.2.20

### Qt Version

6.8.1

### Steps to reproduce

1. Start qTox.
2. Wait online. Or not.
3. Logout.

### Observed Behavior

Segmentation fault.

### Expected Behavior

Await new login.

### Reproducibility

Always

### Operating System

Linux

### Operating System version/distro/name/etc.

pisilinux

### Relevant log output

```shell

comment_data.body:

Do you have a stack trace for that error on close?
Rebuild with pr308. Segfault is out. But new strange error when relogin. `Wrong password`.

I'm so sorry :(

After rebuild
```

glibc-2.39
Also there's no debug info, so it crashes somewhere (0x00005555555ebaa5) but I don't know where that is. Can you build it with `-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug`?

Output with `-DASAN=ON -DUBSAN=ON`

labels.description: Bug fix for the user, not a fix to a build script
labels.name: bug

title: Segmentation fault after logout.
